com.qoppa.pdf

Interface IWindowHandler


  • public interface IWindowHandler
    This interface is used to handle opening and closing of PDFDocuments within a PDFViewerBean. The methods in this class will be called when a document is opened through JavaScript and when an attachment is opened.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDoc(boolean checkSave)
      Close the currently open document, optionally prompting the user to save if the document has been modified.
      void openDoc(PDFSource source)
      Open the PDF source.

    • Method Detail

      • openDoc

        void openDoc(PDFSource source)
             throws PDFException
        Open the PDF source.
        Parameters:
        source - The PDF.
        Throws:
        PDFException

      • closeDoc

        void closeDoc(boolean checkSave)
        Close the currently open document, optionally prompting the user to save if the document has been modified.
        Parameters:
        checkSave - Set to true to prompt the user to save if the document has been modified.
